snippet: The central bank’s action is the strongest measure taken by Chinese officials this year to counteract the economic malaise that has already infected Europe and the United States.
abstract: China's central bank, faced with a sharply slowing economy, weak exports and faltering investment, unexpectedly cuts interest rates by a quarter of a percentage point.
lead_paragraph: The central bank’s action is the strongest measure taken by Chinese officials this year to counteract the economic malaise that has already infected Europe and the United States.

headline.seo: China Cuts Interest Rates as Its Economic Growth Slows
headline.main: China Cuts Lending Rate as Its Economic Growth Slows
headline.print_headline: Grappling Globally With the Economy: Exports Weak And Economy Slowing, China Reduces Rates
